name: GoD:ARENA - DarkStars Edition
description:
Public Alpha of my gravity space action game. Featuring the song 'DarkStars' from @daveragenormal (check out his instagram and spotify). 

We had a sort of collaborative mash up and this version of the game was used to create the official music video for the single (link coming later).

Control Info.

You can play with either a controller or a keyboard and mouse. Controls are displayed in game.

-"Attack" will try to home in on nearby enemies. Pressing a direction will try to prioritise enemies in that direction.

-You have 3 air dashes and 3 air jumps. These are reset when landing, either on ground, a spaceship or enemy wreckage.

-"Fly Mode" requires holding the button. Toggle option will be added later.

-You can't cancel Fly Mode or Dashes into Attacks yet. You can still perform an attack the instant you release the Fly Mode trigger or once the dash impulse ends.

-Attacking with no nearby enemy or direction pressed will attack upwards.

-Yawing in Fly Mode is not very effective. Use Roll and Pitch to be a badass.

-There are no limits on Attacking or Flying. Obviously this is completely broken.
